while(T){
    a = sample(-10:10,1)
    b = sample(-10:10,1)

}

c = a*b

a1 = paste0(a)
b1 = paste0(b)

if(a<0){
    a1 = paste0("(",a,")")
}
if(b<0){
    b1 = paste0("(",b,")")
}
if(c<0){
    c1 = paste0("(",c,")")
}

mystr = paste0(c1,"\\div",a1)
